summary: Water quality is stable but requires monitoring due to slight pH fluctuation and temperature drop.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5; monitor for any significant changes.
Consider partial water changes if TDS continues to rise above 400 ppm.
Ensure water temperature remains between 24°C and 28°C for optimal tilapia growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.036 / 7.016 / 7.088 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 317.653 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 26.408 / 23.56 / 30.44 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
